channel.title: If it's possible, how can I do this?
channel.description: I wanna know if this is possible. You know those targets that give range exp, well.. Is there a way I can make it where you actually need a bow and arrows to shoot at it for exp? Cause I'm thinking of doing a little mini game out of it or something.

item.title: If it's possible, how can I do this?
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

Right click on the object , you’ll see

Examine Target (3215) or something

3215 is the id , so case 3215:

Read full topic

item.title: If it's possible, how can I do this?
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

Search for the object case

case ####: if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** || hasBow) { addExp(####,##); } break;

**** for bow ID

Or hasBow , then you have to add

public boolean hasBow() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** ) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
